ygData.subject: Largo's Binding (was Bard song fixes...)
ygData.msgSnippet: Not so certain if I like the sound of this.  While Verant may classify increasing the range an improvement , I had no problem with the effect radius of the
ygData.messageBody:
Not so certain if I like the sound of this. While Verant may classify
increasing the range an "improvement", I had no problem with the effect
radius of the song as it was. The radius of the song has always been large
enough to allow binding of all the mobs in the general vicinity of where I'm
fighting at. I sure as hell don't want to aggro additional mobs that my
group isn't fighting. It may not be that big a deal in outside zones but in
dungeons this could turn out to be nasty (assuming z-axis bug is still in
effect for bard songs). Anyone know if this song will aggro mobs through
walls in a dungeon?

Galtin of E'ci


Largo's: Range has been increased. Changes are live. Still looking into PvP
behavior.
